document_data.caption: Turning the tide on an aggressor with reverse arrows.
document_data.name: Reverse Arrows
document_data.mainbody: '''''Reverse arrows''''' was an [[abjuration]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s and [[sorcerer]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was similar to ''[[protection from arrows]]'' but all of the harm from a missile striking the caster was negated and the missile was flung back upon its source.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a piece of shell from a tortoise and a ball of tree sap to cast.
